title: Individual Software Professor Teaches Online Library V.1 (3-Users)
description: This is a hands-on course that will provide everything you need to know about the fundamentals of accounting. Business Planning Professor Teaches Business Planning is designed to help you prepare a business plan outline. It will take you from your initial ideas for a business to writing a basic business plan to executing the final business plan. As you develop the business plan and define the actual business, you will also determine the goals of the organization and the company strategy. With a written business plan, you can: • Plan and Start a Business • Apply for a Business
